医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新结核病疫苗对印度的潜在健康和经济影响一份新的预印本讨论了针对青少年和成人的新型结核疫苗如何缓解这一问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/The-potential-health-and-economic-impact-of-new-tuberculosis-vaccines-in-India.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/The-potential-health-and-economic-impact-of-new-tuberculosis-vaccines-in-India.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70629905-1ce0-456f-99db-6f549369aab8 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 06:09:00 -0400 The potential health and economic impact of new tuberculosis vaccines in India
利用 AI 赋能医疗保健：LungDiag NLP 系统改变呼吸系统疾病诊断基于人工智能 (AI) 的诊断系统 LungDiag，用于诊断呼吸系统疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Empowering-healthcare-with-AI-LungDiag-NLP-system-transforms-respiratory-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Empowering-healthcare-with-AI-LungDiag-NLP-system-transforms-respiratory-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9be6beff-da32-464b-9bbc-c42740abdafa Fri, 14 Jul 2023 06:06:00 -0400 Empowering healthcare with AI: LungDiag NLP system transforms respiratory disease diagnosis
新方法：鼻内疫苗接种策略针对 Omicron COVID-19 变种研究人员测试了 NDV-HXP-S 疫苗两至三剂鼻内 (IN) 方案的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Novel-approach-intranasal-vaccination-strategy-targets-Omicron-COVID-19-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Novel-approach-intranasal-vaccination-strategy-targets-Omicron-COVID-19-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4333012d-2427-419e-99e8-4f3301839684 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 05:36:00 -0400 Novel approach: intranasal vaccination strategy targets Omicron COVID-19 variants
研究发现染色质修饰剂 EZH1 的致病性变异是神经发育障碍的原因研究发现 EZH1 的致病变异是神经发育障碍的一个原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-uncovers-pathogenic-variants-in-the-chromatin-modifier-EZH1-as-the-cause-of-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-uncovers-pathogenic-variants-in-the-chromatin-modifier-EZH1-as-the-cause-of-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dac7bf6-a3a1-458d-ae17-cc4a56a920df Fri, 14 Jul 2023 05:01:00 -0400 Study uncovers pathogenic variants in the chromatin modifier EZH1 as the cause of neurodevelopmental disorders
ChatGPT 在准确、精确地解决心力衰竭查询方面表现出了希望研究人员评估了 ChatGPT 在回答心力衰竭相关问题时的准确性和可重复性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/ChatGPT-shows-promise-in-addressing-heart-failure-queries-with-accuracy-and- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/ChatGPT-shows-promise-in-addressing-heart-failure-queries-with-accuracy-and- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36682de3-ee9f-4a1c-98a4-589d6638e433 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 04:49:00 -0400 ChatGPT shows promise in addressing heart failure queries with accuracy and precision
研究强调缺乏衡量儿科患者哮喘控制的金标准研究人员比较了评估初级保健儿童哮喘控制措施的问卷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-highlights-lack-of-gold-standard-for-measuring-asthma-control-in-pediatric-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-highlights-lack-of-gold-standard-for-measuring-asthma-control-in-pediatric-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1be8d013-822b-4306-9c35-022f1ba5eaa7 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Study highlights lack of gold standard for measuring asthma control in pediatric patients
Quanterix 推出 LucentAD 生物标记血液检测，帮助医生诊断阿尔茨海默病患者Quanterix Corporation 是一家通过超灵敏生物标志物检测推动科学发现和突破性诊断的公司，今天宣布推出 LucentAD，这是一种测试，可帮助评估患有与阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 早期症状一致的认知症状的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Quanterix-launches-LucentAD-Biomarker-blood-test-to-aid-physician-diagnosis-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease-in-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Quanterix-launches-LucentAD-Biomarker-blood-test-to-aid-physician-diagnosis-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease-in-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43a6950a-9235-4c94-8f77-9965869c632d Fri, 14 Jul 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Quanterix launches LucentAD Biomarker blood test to aid physician diagnosis of Alzheimer’s disease in patients
研究表明焦虑会增加非痴呆老年人随后认知进展的风险研究人员调查了焦虑对非痴呆老年人认知退化的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-suggests-anxiety-increases-the-risk-of-subsequent-cognitive-progression-in-non-dementia-elderly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Study-suggests-anxiety-increases-the-risk-of-subsequent-cognitive-progression-in-non-dementia-elderly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=603623be-ec72-4946-a7b4-bd37a351612e Fri, 14 Jul 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Study suggests anxiety increases the risk of subsequent cognitive progression in non-dementia elderly
INTEGRA 移液解决方案加速重要的病毒基因组学研究位于美国路易斯安那州的新兴病毒威胁中心 (CEVT) 正在使用 INTEGRA Biosciences 的液体处理解决方案进行 COVID-19 测试和病毒基因组学研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/INTEGRA-pipetting-solutions-accelerate-crucial-viral-genomics-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/INTEGRA-pipetting-solutions-accelerate-crucial-viral-genomics-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5d357d4-5573-4120-8600-b625b2b88513 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 04:25:00 -0400 INTEGRA pipetting solutions accelerate crucial viral genomics research
揭开双相情感障碍的遗传密码研究人员研究了分类和维度双相情感障碍模型之间的遗传关联和遗传力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Unraveling-the-genic-code-of-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Unraveling-the-genic-code-of-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36b798ea-18e1-4377-b38d-9bae9296bcc3 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Unraveling the genetic code of bipolar disorder
